Package jdk.incubator.http.internal.frame

Class FramesEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • jdk.incubator.http.internal.frame.FramesEncoder

  • public class FramesEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Frames Encoder Encode framed into ByteBuffers. The class is stateless.
